1.name: March Speed (All Troops)
1.text: Increases the march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

2.name: Defense (All Troops)
2.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

3.name: Attack (All Troops)
3.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

5.name: Elixir
5.text: Enhances healing effects received by troops by ${1}%

6.name: Hasty Departure
6.text: When troops led by this commander depart from a structure, increases march speed by ${1}% for the next 10 seconds

7.name: Burning Blood
7.text: Normal attacks grant an additional ${1} rage

8.name: Defense (All Troops)
8.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

9.name: Health (All Troops)
9.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

10.name: Health (All Troops)
10.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

11.name: Attack (All Troops)
11.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

12.name: Defense (All Troops)
12.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

13.name: Counterattack
13.text: When healed, troops led by this commander will have their attack increased by ${1}% for the next 3 seconds

14.name: Expert Design
14.text: Increases attack, defense, and health of siege units by ${1}%

15.name: Attack (All Troops)
15.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

16.name: Health (All Troops)
16.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

17.name: March Speed (All Troops)
17.text: Increases the march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

18.name: Emergency Protection
18.text: When troops led by this commander take skill damage, there is a 50% chance that they will gain an additional ${1}% skill damage reduction for the next 3 seconds

19.name: Rejuvenate
19.text: Instantly restores ${1} rage whenever a skill is used

20.name: Cage of Thorns
20.text: After using an active skill, reduces march speed of nearby enemy troops by ${1}% (Duration: 3 seconds; maximum 5 targets)
